name: Verify the api gives response as per the request parameters

testSteps.description: [1] {httpRequest=Api_Url, resource=/comments?, input_fields=postId=, input_values=1, expected_fields=postId__id__name__email, expected_values=1__1__id labore ex et quam laborum__Eliseo@gardner.biz, field=postId, expValue=5}

children.description: When I send http query request using Api_Url /comments? and postId= as 1
When i send HTTP request: https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com, /comments?, postId=, 1
Then I validate postId__id__name__email values as 1__1__id labore ex et quam laborum__Eliseo@gardner.biz in response of webservice
And I count postId occurrence in response of webservice as 5

testSteps.description: [1] {httpRequest=Api_Url, resource=/comments?, input_fields=postId=, input_values=2, expected_fields=postId__id__name__email, expected_values=2__6__et fugit eligendi deleniti quidem qui sint nihil autem__Presley.Mueller@myrl.com, field=postId, expValue=5}

children.description: When I send http query request using Api_Url /comments? and postId= as 2
When i send HTTP request: https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com, /comments?, postId=, 2
Then I validate postId__id__name__email values as 2__6__et fugit eligendi deleniti quidem qui sint nihil autem__Presley.Mueller@myrl.com in response of webservice
And I count postId occurrence in response of webservice as 5

userStory.storyName: As a End user of the api I want to verify the json response
